Description:
" LYNNWOOD", Character & History
The home, originally built in Moorabool Street Geelong in 1882, was relocated to its present site in Clifton Springs in 2005. Some of the stand out features include 2 double sided chimneys rebuilt to original specifications and servicing the 4 bedrooms with four uniquely different fireplace surrounds, 11'ceilings, Original 1&1/4" thick Baltic pine flooring throughout, and original doors and fittings. The curved kitchen bench built of cedar originally from the old Hamilton Hotel and antique french doors from Paris. The second building to the rear, built in the 1905 was originally the local chappel at Snake Valley servicing the Gold mining community of the time, with its stained glass windows and unique domed ceiling would make a fabulous home studio. It has been a labour of love by the present owner to bring these historic building back to their original glory. Modern features include: new plumbing, new wiring, new roofing and all council permits in place. Property is to be sold at Auction.
Insights: 28 Derribong Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
So Much For So Little!
This pretty 3 bedroom home is a real find. Light and bright and offering 2 separate living zones- formal lounge at the front of the home plus open plan family/meals and kitchen (DW & pantry) at the rear. There is access from this room to the outdoor living and rear yard. All bedrooms have robes & ceiling fans and there is a full ensuite & bay window to the master. Tasteful decor through-out, 2 x reverse cycle air conditioners, enclosed carport/garage with rear yard access, neat gardens and even bay views! An inspection is a must!

Description:
Stylish Family Living
Beautifully presented this light-filled home boasts a superb open-plan design and a true sense of space.
The versatile floor plan comprises three bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, separate lounge and large north facing kitchen/living area. The living space opens to an undercover north facing deck featuring bay glimpses.
A large shed (12m x 4m) at the rear of the property is fitted with a pot belly stove, power and light making it the ideal work shop.
Other features include water tanks with pump, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, natural gas heating
Set amid low-maintenance native gardens this picture perfect residence is sure to impress.
A wonderful home offering the ideal coastal lifestyle, and the surrounding region is known for its wineries set in picturesque countryside and popular bike trails.
Luke Campbell : 0409 554 949
Insights: 10 Labulla Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED EXTRA LARGE FAMILY HOME ON DOUBLE BLOCK.
This home is sure to impress. With its pretty, easily maintained gardens, it has great street appeal and is situated on a generous 1,465 m2 block conveniently located close to all the amenities a family could want. Tastefully decorated and immaculately presented, the formal lounge and dining gives access to the Blackwood timber kitchen with new stainless steel appliances and leads into the informal dining area and through to the substantial family room with sliding doors out to the covered verandah which wraps around the rear and sides of the home and overlooks the large secure back garden. Two of the three generous sized bedrooms on the ground floor have fitted wardrobes with the third offering a fully fitted walk-in-robe and two-way bathroom. A separate toilet and laundry complete the ground floor accommodation. Upstairs boasts a large master bedroom and generous retreat with sliding door leading onto a large wrap around balcony. The luxurious ensuite with spa and separate shower and the fully fitted walk-in-robe/dressing room offers a truly decadent parent retreat. Features of this property include ducted central heating; reverse cycle air conditioning, wood heater, remote controlled awning over kitchen patio and much more. The double entry driveway offers extensive car parking and gives access to a detached double lock up garage and workshop, ideal for the tradesman, together with plenty of room for parking the boat and/or caravan.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.

The house has an open-plan living, dining and kitchen area, with a bedroom at each end. The slate kitchen has electric cooking and a double pantry. The garage is secure, has light and power, and would be ideal to store a boat, caravan or man's project.

Description:
Central Drysdale Rural Living
Approx. 2 hectares of land in the centre of Drysdale's proposed growth corridor is available for the astute purchaser to enjoy the lifestyle today and the financial benefits in the future. Situated in close proximity to both the Drysdale town centre and the Drysdale reserve, this property represents an ability to obtain capital growth through an increased property price upon increased demand for land in the area. Comprising a solid 3 bedroom home with kitchen, dining and large lounge flowing onto decking with rural views, and a further living space downstairs allowing a conversion into bedrooms or just enjoy the extra room. Currently tenanted with the ability to maintain tenancy or offer vacant possession, this lifestyle property is priced to sell!

Description:
VIEWS, A SWIM IN THE BAY, GOLF CLUB AND JETTY AROUND THE CORNER!
You have the lot here at no. 3 (approx. 595 SQM) , existing residential quiet court location with north facing backyard and build that special home to take in all the views, the sunsets are fantastic. Walk everywhere the jetty , clubs, swimming and fishing facilities as well as a new supermarket to open by September 2015 . Schools, corner shops and numerous parklands available without taking the car from home . All this here in Clifton Springs with the beauty of the Bellarine on your doorstop, The thriving city of Geelong about 20 minutes away, providing excellent tertiary facilities, numerous retail outlets, hospitals, entertainment and so much more. Call me now to discuss further.

Land with a View
Good calibre homes have been built with the views in mind. Almost the last opportunity to buy in this street, 500m2 in size means your dream home will allow you to enjoy the lifestyle of relaxing on a deck with a wine and some friends watching the sunset or that large ship meander thru Corio Bay. Clifton Springs has been put on the map for its quiet existence away from the hustle and bustle of a coastal resort, but having said that you are only 10 minutes away from coastal resorts. All the amenities to work and play are available.

Description:
Fantastic family home on a rare double block! 1200sqm approx
This family home has it all - a spacious corner allotment, double garage, double carport, 4 bedrooms, open plan formal and informal living and dining zones and a vast undercover outdoor entertainment area. The quiet bayside location is the icing on this sweet cake! Built with quality appointments, for a blissful family lifestyle, this home is better than most!
Established gardens enhance privacy to the façade and provide a pleasant outlook for the living zones. A clever floor plan links the entrance area, formal living, formal dining, the kitchen, informal dining and living in a circular fashion. These areas have specific functions but can be used openly when entertaining. The entire area is graced with beautiful natural light from many floor-to-ceiling windows and merges with the expansive alfresco zone through 2 sets of glass sliders.
The kitchen boasts extensive hardwood cabinetry - everything will have a place! Electric Chef appliances include a cooktop, wall oven and grill. Stone bench tops are low maintenance and decadent.
The bedrooms extend from an internal hallway and can be shut off from the living domain. There are 2 queen-sized bedrooms with built-in robes adjacent to the laundry (sewing room) and spotless family bathroom with spa bath, shower, toilet and vanity. Terminating the hallway, the private master bedroom offers a walk-in robe and en suite with stone-topped vanity, shower, toilet and bidet.
The alfresco zone views the spacious and private backyard with a lush lawn, productive vegetable gardens, fruit trees, citrus and olives and lovely roses. This spacious party spot boasts a useful catering station or utility room with kitchenette, laundry facilities and storage.
Electric under-slab heating throughout. Reverse cycle AC, ceiling fans and ducted vacuum.
A circular driveway provides easy access to both the carport and DLUG. The well-proportioned garage offers great storage or workshop space.
A homely home with many features to delight! View ASAP!
- Spacious corner allotment in a quiet bayside location
- Formal living and dining, informal living and dining plus study
- Expansive undercover alfresco merges with indoor living
- Master with en suite and WIR, minor BRs with built-in robes
- Established gardens include vegetables, fruit and olive trees and roses
- DLUG and double carport accessed from circular driveway
Land: 1200 sq m approx.
Insights: 6-8 Leawarra Way, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.

Description:
Views of Corio Bay
Owner will consider offers. Elevated position overlooking Corio Bay to the You Yangs. Your opportunity to build a statement with great views from ground level. Fully fenced with a high front privacy fence. Could be the ideal site for a dream owner builder project. Located close to town with great access to Portarlington.
Insights: 13 Whitcombes Road, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SPACIOUS CONTEMPORARY LIVING AND BAY VIEWS
This spacious contemporary home is offered in pristine condition throughout and has lovely Bay views back to Geelong and the You Yangs.
Accommodation provides wide entrance hall, four double bedrooms with built in robes the main with ensuite , second bathroom, large well appointed kitchen with sumptuous open plan dining and living room opening to a large under cover alfresco deck with water views, and downstairs a separate rumpus room.
Further features include double garage with excellent storage, garden shed, water tanks, outdoor spa and well maintained gardens.

Address: 153 Country Club Drive CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222
Description:
Opportunity Knocks! 839m2
Set on a generous allotment of 839sqm(approx) and just minutes to the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course and safe boat harbour this property offers endless potential! This original home comprises 3 bedrooms, the master with BIR and access to the 2 way bathroom complete with bath, shower and separate toilet. A spacious light filled living room leads to central kitchen and meals area featuring all electric appliances and a brand new upright stove. Other features include a large garden shed, large undercover parking area set behind locked gates and ducted gas central heating throughout. Potential to redevelop, renovate or subdivide (STCA) " A Great Opportunity"
Insights: 153 Country Club Drive, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.

Address: 78 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BUILT TO LAST, ENJOY AWESOME VIEWS
This Wookey built home would have been ahead of it's time for design. Making the most of the views of Corio Bay this home was originally used as a holiday house by the current vendors who then decided to retire here. They are now moving onto the next phase of their life so are offering this unique home to a discerning buyer and have said that the main thing they will miss is the view they have from the lounge and the upstairs deck.Imagine time spent with family in this spacious lower level. Kid's downstairs & parents upstairs would work very well in this house. Too many features to list, three bedrooms, fourth bedroom or study, 1 bathroom, ensuite, extra shower, toilet vanity off the laundry, double garage, space around the house, storage, ample off street parking. Want to know more then why not come and see what this lovely home has to offer?
Insights: 78 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS
Expansive bay views and enormous potential abound in this large two storey family home.
Ideal for the tradesman who could further develop this home to being something spectacular in this elevated position, accommodation includes five bedrooms plus study, ensuite to main, and second bathroom.
Downstairs the kitchen opens to a separate dining room as well as open plan meals and family area. A large second living area upstairs opens to a balcony and both take in substantial bay views.
Further includes easy off street parking to the car port, garden shed and gas heating.

Description:
Prestigious location, panoramic water views
Reward yourself & take advantage of the location this impressive residence makes the most of the panoramic views of Geelong, Corio Bay shipping channels & the You Yangs. The grand entry opens out to a wide hallway & formal lounge / billiard room. There is a guest bedroom with ensuite on the first level.
The kitchen overlooks the dining area & spacious lounge.
Stone bench tops, a 900 mm oven with five gas burner cooktop & island preparation bench.
A full butlers pantry serves as a second kitchen with sink & gas cooktop so you can entertain guests & keep an immaculate kitchen.
The lounge hosts a projector for 'that movie theatre' experience.
The dining alcove will host the largest of tables.
The alfresco area with traditional timber styling offers a relaxed area for summer entertaining.
Upstairs, the casual lounge with large single window offers uninterrupted panoramic bay views akin to a high-rise hotel.
A built in natural gas log fire is showcased in a solid timber entertainment unit made from a single tree.
The opulent master bedroom with balcony access, his & hers dressing rooms, a full size private ensuite with a deep bath & over sized shower.
An open study or music room could also be made into a library.
The third & fourth bedrooms are serviced by the third bathroom.
A double garage for the everyday ride & a long side drive to park a large caravan.
The property would not be complete without the toy shed to house your pride & joy, be it boat, bikes or classic car.
Nothing is done on a small scale with this executive style residence.
Insights: 3 Wintersun Court, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Entry to the Market
Situated only a short stroll away from Clifton Springs Safe Boat Harbour and amenities this home is prefect for first home buyers, investors or active retirees looking for that seachange lifestyle.
Offering 3 good size bedrooms all with built in robes, master with entrance to central family bathroom with spa, large lounge room and separate open plan dining and kitchen area. The home also has split system heating and cooling, carport and good size backyard with ample of room of boat and caravan.
The property is currently tenanted with a return of $13035.00pa approx. and is available for inspection by appointment

Description:
Lifestyle Opportunities Abound!
This is the life! A spacious family home offers extensive views of the local area and bay complete with huge elevated outdoor entertainment area and in-ground solar heated pool. Set on a fantastic allotment of approximately 1121m2 with ample room to store the boat, caravan and all the family's toys. The home offers spacious lounge & dining, new central kitchen with quality appliances plus 3 generously sized bedrooms and central bathroom. Downstairs there is also a separate studio or perhaps a room for the teenagers of the home to escape to. Reverse cycle air conditioners, central gas heating, double carport, 4 water tanks, solar panels, awnings, a second shower & WC for pool users, side access- the list goes on. Call us to arrange a time to view.
Insights: 40-42 Dandarriga Drive, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.
